# Body

**Associated Type**

The type of keyframes representing the body of this type.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Body : Keyframes
```

## Discussion

When you create a custom keyframes type, Swift infers this type from your implementation of the required [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Keyframes/body-swift.property] property.

## Creating a keyframe

- **body**: The composition of content that comprise the keyframes.
- **Value**: The type of value animated by this keyframes type
